name: civiclemma
description: Civic Issue Reporting and Municipal Accountability Platform for India

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:ml"
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.install:ml: cd ml && python3 -m venv .venv && .venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd server && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../client && rm -rf node_modules .next
